channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Four Years of the War in Ukraine
item.description: CSIS experts discuss the last four years of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: The Russia-Ukraine War and Global Food Security: Impacts Four Years Later
item.description: Russia’s war in Ukraine caused immediate and widespread disruptions to Ukraine’s agriculture sector and global food markets. Today, new patterns are emerging, affecting Ukraine’s agricultural recovery and Russia’s ability to use its food exports for political benefit.
